title: How to deal with the situation that is created by yourself - Quora

response.answer_text: This is a two answer question to me. I think if you create something great, such as something huge, as a college education, or career for yourself, you should enjoy that and be proud of yourself. On the other hand, if you’ve flourished a dramatic situation, and it grows into a monster, if possible, it might be smart and right to own that as well. Sometimes it’s difficult to do, especially because you might hurt someone else while doing so. Making amends for something you’ve created can be difficult, but in the end you will feel better inside. My opinion anyhow. I know it sounds good but saying and doing are completely different.

I would curse myself first. Because I would have to be really stupid to do that. I would analyze the situation and try to find a solution for it. We can’t just sit there and day dream about it. We got to think and execute it. We wouldn’t want to stay in the puddle and embarrass ourselves more. Think with a cool and calm mind.
